name: Calamity 3: Around the World
description:
Front of Sleeve - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Still trapped in the Old west with Jules Verne and Calamity Jane, Mona and Moki must finish their quest to get back to their own century. To help our heroes on the final part of their journey, your child will read articles about careers, hobbies, children's adventures, and those whose lives made a difference. So get ready for the exciting finale - and a surprise ending!

LEARNING OBJECTIVES
  • Use reading strategies to answer questions
  • Use contextual clues to understand text meaning
  • Analyze words containing Greek or Latin roots, prefixes, or suffixes
  • Learn new vocabulary words
  • Understand and solve analogies and riddles
  • Identify main idea
  • Appreciate and learn about cultures around the world
